document_data.name: Sky Lizard Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sky Lizard Mountains''', also known as the '''Luo Peaks''', was a branch of the [[Peaks of Flame]] that jutted toward [[Thindol]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]].
document_data.Description: The towering peaks showed signs of wind erosion.
document_data.Geography: [[File:Chult-small.jpg|thumb|300px|''A late 15{{th}} century [[DR]] map of Chult showing the Sky Lizard Mountains in the southeast.'']]These mountains were found in southeastern [[Chult]] near the border of Thindol and [[Samarach]]. Along with the [[Sanrach Mountains]] to the south, they formed the mountainous border of the [[Chultengar]] and the [[Valley of Dread]],
